title: Were the people of Houston warned against using gas masks during the splashing of the Miskito?
subtitle: A warning video about the use of insecticides in parts of Texas obtains some wrong facts and greatly overestimates the risks to the public.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2017, the authorities in Houston warned the population not to use gas masks while they sprayed the area with neurotoxic insecticides that "caused brain damage."
